scripts.dev: bun run preflight:dev && bun run services:up && bash -lc 'if bun infra/scripts/wait-for-postgres.ts --retries=10 --interval-ms=1000; then bun run migration:up; else echo "[dev] Postgres unavailable; skipping migrations and starting servers anyway"; fi' && API_ORIGIN=http://localhost:4000 concurrently -n next,bunapi -k "bun --bun next dev" "cd apps/api && bun install && bun --watch src/index.ts"
scripts.dev:web: bun run preflight:dev && bun run services:up && bash -lc 'if bun infra/scripts/wait-for-postgres.ts --retries=10 --interval-ms=1000; then bun run migration:up; else echo "[dev:web] Postgres unavailable; skipping migrations and starting web only"; fi' && bun --bun next dev
scripts.dev:stop: bash -lc 'pkill -f "next dev" || true; pkill -f "concurrently -n next,bunapi" || true; pkill -f "bun --watch src/index.ts" || true'
scripts.services:up: bash -lc '/usr/bin/docker compose -f infra/compose.yaml up -d >/dev/null 2>&1 || docker compose -f infra/compose.yaml up -d >/dev/null 2>&1 || echo "[services:up] docker not found; skipping container startup"'
scripts.services:stop: bash -lc '/usr/bin/docker compose -f infra/compose.yaml stop >/dev/null 2>&1 || docker compose -f infra/compose.yaml stop >/dev/null 2>&1 || echo "[services:stop] docker not found; nothing to stop"'
scripts.services:down: bash -lc '/usr/bin/docker compose -f infra/compose.yaml down >/dev/null 2>&1 || docker compose -f infra/compose.yaml down >/dev/null 2>&1 || echo "[services:down] docker not found; nothing to remove"'
scripts.lint: bun run lint:eslint:check && bun run lint:prettier:check
scripts.test:all: bun run test:api && bun run test:web
scripts.test:api: cd apps/api && bun install && bun test
scripts.test:web:auto: bash -lc 'set -a; source .env.development; set +a; bun run services:up; if bun infra/scripts/wait-for-postgres.ts --retries=5 --interval-ms=1000; then bun run test:web:stack; else echo "[test:web] Postgres unavailable; running non-DB suites only"; bun run test:unit && bun run test:ui && bun run test:integration:models && bun run test:integration:services; fi'
scripts.test:web:stack: bash -lc 'set -a; source .env.development; set +a; bun run services:up && bun run wait-for-postgres && bun run migration:up && concurrently -n next,bunapi,buntest -k -s command-buntest "API_ORIGIN=http://localhost:4000 TEST_MODE=1 bun --bun next dev" "cd apps/api && bun install && TEST_MODE=1 API_PORT=4000 bun src/index.ts" "sleep 4 && bun run test:web:suites"'
scripts.test:web:suites: bun run test:unit && bun run test:ui && bun run test:integration:models && bun run test:integration:services && bun run test:integration:repositories && bun run test:integration:api
scripts.api:dev: cd apps/api && bun install && bun --watch src/index.ts
